about_the_game:
Meow Master: Battle for Catnip is a survival game where players select a lovable meow character to engage in friendly battles for catnip. Choose your adorable companion from a variety of cute meows, each with unique abilities. Engage in playful combat, using friendly tactics and skillful maneuvers. Customize your meow with accessories. Explore charming environments and join friends for multiplayer matches. It's a heartwarming adventure where fun prevail, as you become the ultimate champion of fluffy battles.

How to play:

When you start the game, your Meow character will have a total of 9 lives. Once you use them all up, you'll die. So, make sure you fight, hide, and even steal to stay alive! When you lose a life, your Meow will transform into something else, but don't worry, each life comes with its own unique set of skills. To win, you'll have to fight other Meows, run, hide, and avoid traps to get your paws on that catnip!

Game Features:

This game is purrfect for playing with your friends in multiplayer mode. And, if you're not a fan of the voice chat, you can use the chat system to communicate with other Meows in the game. Plus, there are tons of interesting maps to explore and play on! So, let's get started and become the ultimate Meow Master!

name: Meow Master: Battle for Catnip

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 64-bit or Windows 10 64-bit or Windows 11 64-bit
  • Processor: i3-8300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Hey there, fellow cat lovers! Get ready to become a Meow Master and fight for the ultimate prize: catnip! In this game, you'll have to use your cat-like skills to fight, run, and hide your way to the finish line, all while making sure you stay alive. Remember, you only have 9 lives!
supported_languages: English, German, Japanese, Thai, Spanish - Spain
